silex_client.utils.datatypes module

class silex_client.utils.datatypes.ReadOnlyDict

Bases: dict

Pointer to an editable dict. It allows to read its data but not to edit it

static clear() → None.  Remove all items from D.
static pop(k[, d]) → v, remove specified key and return the corresponding value.

If key is not found, d is returned if given, otherwise KeyError is raised

static update([E, ]**F) → None.  Update D from dict/iterable E and F.

If E is present and has a .keys() method, then does: for k in E: D[k] = E[k] If E is present and lacks a .keys() method, then does: for k, v in E: D[k] = v In either case, this is followed by: for k in F: D[k] = F[k]

exception silex_client.utils.datatypes.ReadOnlyError

Bases: Exception

Simple exception for the readonly datatypes
